troparion: (Tone 3) O holy and almighty King,* whom everything fears with trembling,* save us: for You can forgive our sins as the compassionate One.
prokimenon: Unto You I will cry, O Lord my God, lest You turn from me in silence.
second_prokimenon: The Lord will give strength to His people,
the Lord will bless His people with peace.
Bring to the Lord, O you sons of God; bring to the Lord young rams.
